# Logs
*.log

# Runtime data
*.pid
*.seed
*.pid.lock

# Configuration files with sensitive data
config.json
*.key
*.pem

# Client configuration files
*client_configs.txt

# Temporary files
*.tmp

# OS generated files
.DS_Store
.DS_Store?
._*
.Spotlight-V100
.Trashes
ehthumbs.db
Thumbs.db

# IDE files
.vscode/
.idea/
*.swp
*.swo
*~

# Backup files
*.bak
*.backup
